.method public hidebysig virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryDeserializerBuildResult BuildExpression(class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution resolution, class Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, class Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryDeserializerBuilderContext context) cil managed

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.summary: The resolution to obtain type information from.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: The schema to map to the type.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the resolution is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" /> and the
            schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" />; an unsuccessful result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a record deserializer for a type-schema pair.
